description:
Safe and visible. Tick those two boxes with this PFD. It's also quick drying and won't prevent your little one from having tons of fun. The incorporated strap adjustment system gives it a secure, custom fit.

  • Nylon body and head rest panels are durable
  • Large grab strap on collar for ease of rescue
  • Anti mildew high buoyancy foam
  • Integrated webbing adjustment system
  • Infant is for 9–14kg (20–30lb.)
  • Child is for 14–27kg (30–60lb.)
  • Youth is for 27–41kg (60–90lb.)
name: Level Six Stingray PFD - Infants to Youths
